channel.title: A little help with a command

item.title: A little help with a command
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

Change

[code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“infhp”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“blah”)) {
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
c.playerLevel[3] = 99999;
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
c.gfx0(754);
c.sendMessage(“Wow Infinite Health?”);

	    }[/code]

To

[code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“infhp”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“blah”) || (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“infhp”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“blah”)) {
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
c.playerLevel[3] = 99999;
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
c.gfx0(754);
c.sendMessage(“Wow Infinite Health?”);

	    }[/code]

Replace blah and blah to what you want and add more if you need

Read full topic
item.source: A little help with a command

item.title: A little help with a command
item.dc:creator: @rich_noob_xd rich noob xd
item.description:
@rich_noob_xd wrote:

Hello. I was wondering if there is a way to make it so only certain people can use this command, not necessaries ranks. At first I used c.playerName, but I can only use 1 name in that, correct me if I am wrong. I do not want to use c.playerRights, I only want certain names. If anyone can help me out, thanks.

[code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“infhp”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“blah”)) {
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
c.playerLevel[3] = 99999;
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
c.gfx0(754);
c.sendMessage(“Wow Infinite Health?”);

	    }[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: A little help with a command
